      • containsEntityId

        public boolean containsEntityId(int entityId)
        Gets whether a particular Entity Id is in use by this attachment. This is called when the player interacts to find out which entity was interacted with.
        Parameters:
        entityId - to check
        Returns:
        True if the entity id is part of this attachment

      • getMountEntityId

        public int getMountEntityId()
        Gets an Entity Id of an Entity other entities can mount to mount this attachment. Returns -1 if no mounting is possible.
        Returns:
        Mountable entity Id, or -1 if not mountable

        public void onPositionUpdate()
        Called right after the position transformation matrix is updated. Relative positioning of the attachment should happen here.

        public static void deinitialize(CartAttachment attachment)
